title: Chromosome
description: A governance element (value, tool, or practice) that can be added to a holon's DNA sequence

holonId.description: ID of the holon that owns this chromosome

description.description: Explanation of what this chromosome represents

createdAt.description: Unix timestamp when chromosome was created

icon.description: Optional icon identifier (icon name from svelte-feather-icons or emoji)

color.description: Optional custom color (hex color code or TailwindCSS class)
